doc:
Christopher Corey Smith https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christopher_Corey_Smith 0 Christopher Corey Smith is an American actor who voices in various English-language dubs of Japanese anime shows, and in cartoons and video games. Some of his major roles include Spandam in One Piece, John Balks in Future Diary, Riser Phenex in High School DxD, and Soyuz in Fullmetal Alchemist: The Sacred Star of Milos. In cartoons and video games, his major roles include the Joker in Lego Batman 2 and Lego Batman: The Movie – DC Super Heroes Unite, Molag Bal in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, Hank Johnson in Ingress, Rufus in Street Fighter, Hotshot in Defiance and The Emperor in Dissidia Final Fantasy. Christopher_Corey_Smith is an_American_actor who voices in various_English-language_dubs of Japanese_anime_shows , and in cartoons and video_games . Some of his_major_roles include Spandam in One_Piece , John_Balks in Future_Diary , Riser_Phenex in High_School_DxD , and Soyuz in Fullmetal_Alchemist : The_Sacred_Star of Milos . In cartoons and video_games , his_major_roles include the_Joker in Lego_Batman_2 and Lego_Batman : The_Movie – DC_Super_Heroes_Unite , Molag_Bal in The_Elder_Scrolls_V : Skyrim , Hank_Johnson in Ingress , Rufus in Street_Fighter , Hotshot in Defiance and The_Emperor in Dissidia_Final_Fantasy .
